title: A redesign
content:
A recent redesign of California Apparel News. In the process, fell in love with News Gothic, once again.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [before+after.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081830/http:/typophile.com/files/before+after.jpg) | 53.6 KB |
author: Feelingrandy

comments.content: Do you more and larger photos? It looks cool, but I can’t really see much in those tiny images.

_...I had a king dressed in drip-dry and paisley  
Lately he's taken to saying I'm crazy and blind  
He lives in another time..._
